title: Love Island's India Reynolds stuns in lingerie at raunchy shoot in the country
text:

Love Island star India Reynolds has given fans a glimpse into a life of luxury.

The brunette beauty took to her Instagram story to reveal to her 1.1 million followers that she was doing a lingerie shoot in a very fancy-looking home in the country.

The 28 year-old, who came third in this year's Love Island alongside beau Ovie Soko , documented her time in the gorgeous house.

"Today's location is wild," India laughed, zooming the camera in on a looming stuffed bear, "Not very vegan."

She was shooting with fellow model Georgia Bayliss, and the two looked sensational as they frolicked for the cameras in lingerie.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

"Christmas round at ours," she joked, focusing on an immaculate Christmas tree.

India turned the camera onto the grounds, saying: "Might want to take a stroll in the garden."

She and pal Georgia were shooting for luxury lingerie and swimwear brand, Pour Moi.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: ITV)

India's been in the public eye since she first appeared on Love Island - after a time, she managed to hook up with the guy she'd been eyeing, fan favourite Ovie.

The pair were an instant hit with fans, and even made it to the final.

They were, however, rocked by rumours of cheating, after India was accused of snogging her ex, footballer Kieran Gibbs.

She denied the allegations, but some fans reckon a split is just around the corner.

While being an official couple, both India and Ovie are extremely busy with their respective careers.

Both have landed lucrative deals with big fashion names - Ovie at ASOS, and India at competitor BooHoo.

Being part of one of ASOS' main competitors, India was even stopped by her contract from attending Ovie's launch party.
description: India shared a sneak peak with her fans of a Christmas-themed photoshoot in which she showed off her toned body
